answers.answer: Watch you salt intake, and drink plenty of water. Though,if your swelling is worse than normal or came on suddenly, you should contact your OB or midwife- it can be a sign of preeclampsia.
Compression socks (athletic grade). I also wear uggs all the time, even in the house because they keep me comfortable and kept constant pressure..ny feet got pretty swollen last pregnancy
Mine just started this week Im 37 weeks and they dont go down and hurt tooo !!

question: How should I keep the swelling down? Other then elevation..I just woke up and they are swollen. Haven't even been walking around :(
title: My feet are balloons!
